nodes.text: Heartweed was a type of small herb. The human Esmelle grew Sinthan seed and other herbs in a hydrodome in her home's kitchen on the planet Akiva. Heartweed and oi-oi berries were used as an ingredient in fruit jellies served at Takodana Castle.

Heartweed was first mentioned in the novel Aftermath, which was written by Chuck Wendig and released in 2015. It later appeared as a background prop in Takodana Castle in Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens, a film released in December of the same year.
